Sec. 2-8.2.1. Anti-bid shopping measures.
It is the policy of Miami-Dade County that all County departments operating Disadvantaged Business Enterprise Programs pursuant to federal legal requirements shall implement the anti-bid shopping measures contained in of the Code of Miami-Dade County [Ordinance No. 92-45] and the implementing administrative order as same may be amended from time to time to the maximum extent permitted under applicable federal law with the concurrence of the applicable federal enforcement authority.
